cards.teacher_script: Our special Hebrew word today is TERUMAH! Can you say it? Te-ru-MAH! It means a gift - but not just any gift. A terumah is a gift you give because you WANT to, from your heart. The Torah says the people brought gifts "from everyone whose heart moved them." That means they felt the giving feeling inside! When you share something because you want to help, that's a terumah. Can you think of a terumah you gave? Let's say it again: Terumah!
